pageContext.claim: “Dishwashers. They have dishwashers they don't give you any water. They give you not enough water, so they're lousy. So what do people do? They press the button again, and again. No water. I let them have lots of water. We just got back from Whirlpool in Ohio.”
pageContext.analysis: Think hard about this claim. Have you ever met anyone who had to run the dishwasher this many times because of low water pressure?
